content: make 2 stitches for the gap between palm and thumb like this see photo instructions below pick up the stitch from below that first stitch on your right needle and knit it through the front loop 1st stitch increased now pick up the loop of the stitch from below the following stitch and knit it 2nd stitch increased k to end pattern and photos are © gralina frie 2016 this pattern is for personal and not-profit use read the photos from left to right then the row below the photo above shows the completed gap increases next round k 1 k2tog k to end = 27 29 35 sts next round k all knit until piece measures 9 10 11 cm/3 5 4 4¼ from gap decrease round 1 ssk k to last 2 sts before m k2tog slm ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog decrease round 2 k all now work decrease round 1 until you have 5 6 7 sts on the inside of the mitten and 6 7 8 sts on the outside next round ssk k2tog k1 k2tog slm ssk k2 k2tog the numbers now add up 3 4 5 sts between each stitch marker m+l work an additional decrease round = 4 6 sts in total all cut the yarn and thread the end through the remaining stitches twice and pull taut weave in the ends left mitten next round sl m k to last 2 stitches before m m1r k1 m1l k1 slm k to last 4 sts m1l k to end next 2 rounds k all next round sl m k to last 4 stitches before m m1r k3 m1l k1 slm k to end next 2 rounds k all repeat increasing for thumb like this adding 1 stitch on each side of the thumb gore on every 3rd round for a total of 4 times = 9 thumb sts after the last increase round proceed directly to shape palm shape palm next round k to last 10 sts before m slip the 9 thumb stitches onto a stitch holder now cast on 2 stitches for the gap between palm and thumb like this pick up the stitch from below that first stitch on your right needle and knit it through the front loop 1st stitch increased now pick up the loop of the stitch from below the following stitch and knit it 2nd stitch increased k to end next round k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 slm k to end = 27 29 35 sts next round k all knit until piece measures 9 10 11 cm/3 5 4 4¼ from gap decrease round 1 ssk k to last 2 sts before m k2tog slm ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog decrease round 2 k all now work decrease round 1 until you have 5 6 7 sts on the inside of the mitten and 6 7 8 sts on the outside next round ssk k2 k2tog slm ssk
